tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: JAG: Full Engagement
programme.desc: While on their day off, Harm takes Mac for a flight in his vintage airplane, only to be forced to make an emergency landing in a mountain clearing because of mechanical problems.

programme.title: JAG: Cowboys and Cossaks
programme.desc: Harm, Mac, and Bud are assigned sea duty to monitor a joint war games exercise between U.S. and Russian naval forces.

programme.title: JAG: The Guardian
programme.desc: Harm and Mac defend Bauwer, a former Navy Seal, now a homeless man, who's accused of using excessive force when he killed three men who tried to hold up a convenience store.

programme.title: JAG: Rendevous
programme.desc: Mac and Harm once again find themselves courtroom adversaries as Mac is assigned the difficult task of defending CPO Holst, an admitted wife abuser accused of murdering his wife's boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ice Ca-Cabes
programme.desc: When a mission in the desert results in exploding shrapnel that seriously wounds Cabe, Team Scorpion must freeze his body in order to save his life.

programme.title: Scorpion: Faux Money Maux Problems
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Hole Truth
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must save a man teetering on the edge of a massive sink hole that threatens to destroy the Los Angeles water supply forever.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sharknerdo
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's job to find sunken treasure goes awry when Walter and Paige's boat explodes, leaving them lost in the middle of the Pacific Ocean surrounded by sharks.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Class Dismissed
programme.desc: As local high schools wind to a close for summer, dangerous pranks abound – including the theft of an armed police car. While tracking down the stolen vehicle, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a volatile teen boy.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Good Shoot
programme.desc: Dov Epstein happens upon a convenience store robbery-in-progress that results in him shooting a young black teenager.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girl’s Night Out
programme.desc: On Traciʼs first day as a detective, all hell breaks loose when a carload of girls from a bachelorette party hits another vehicle, killing the driver. Jerry discovers that the driver of the parked car was dead before the accident.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Messy Houses
programme.desc: While answering a domestic disturbance call, Andyʼs personal life is turned inside out when the social worker on the scene turns out to be her estranged mother.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation at the now-abandoned old police station and courts in Accrington. With the team splitting up to cover as much space as they can, something seems to be stalking them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT3
programme.desc: The third and final part of this terrifying and intriguing investigation into the paranormal activity at Accrington’s Old Police Station and Courts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding is back with the first part of a brand-new episode of Most Haunted. The intrepid ghost hunter has taken her team to the historic hall, which is said to be haunted by ancestral ghosts, the apparition of a white lady and a demon dog.

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt2
programme.desc: Watch the second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation of a historic hall, where the paranormal activity includes the disembodied sounds of children laughing and crying and the apparition of a white lady.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads her team in a two-part investigation at the foreboding Gloucester Prison, one of Britain's most haunted places, known for its history of death, fear, pain, suicide, and incarceration.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to King George, Virginia to become the first paranormal team to investigate Belle Grove Plantation.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantoms of the Opera
programme.desc: On this special Halloween episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio to investigate the Cincinnati Music Hall, a buildingwhere the hauntingsare as frequent as the performances.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 8
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Serial Killer's Revenge
programme.desc: Jason and the TAPS team head to Charleston, South Carolina, one of the most haunted cities in America and winner of Ghost Hunters America's Hometown Ghost Hunt Contest.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice.

programme.title: Andromeda: Deep Midnight's Voice
programme.desc: While caught in a battle between two Nietzschean prides, the crew captures a hostile who claims that his pride possesses a map of the slipstream.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.sub-title: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.241
programme.desc: A man describes his relationship as "friends with benefits" with a woman who claims she lent him money for living expenses. A woman sues her former live-in boyfriend for home renovation costs and furniture expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.84
programme.desc: A contract between cousins to ‘share’ a Pontiac Grand Am ends with a fight over the return of the car with allegedly ‘missing’ speakers/A fight over a three-way gym membership leaves a young woman at odds with her ex-boyfriend and his best friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.178
programme.desc: Two women fight at a Halloween party over wearing the same costume, disputing their relationship with the Sheriff’s department. A woman crashes her co-worker's car into oncoming traffic, admitting she was driving without a license.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.218
programme.desc: A man is allegedly chased out of a bar and viciously attacked after being accused of stealing a woman’s purse.\t\t\t\r\nA man hits black ice and has a wreck in his brother’s ex-girlfriend’s car; she sues him for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.137
programme.desc: Alleged assault, vandalism, and marijuana use are the source of\t\t\t\r\ncontention between a woman and her nephew’s ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.1
programme.desc: A month after meeting online, unwed parents decide to live together but then fight over cross-country moving expenses/Judge Judy asks if a man will remove and hand over one of his diamond earrings to pay a single mother back for an alleged loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.93
programme.desc: Man sues ex-girlfriend for car loan and carpet cleaner return; she alleges jealousy. Woman claims ex-lover's drug addiction led to eviction; he sues for furniture and electronic equipment return.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.79
programme.desc: A teenager puts his father in a choke-hold to demonstrate how he allegedly assaulted another boy at school who passed out cold and is suing for medical expenses/Two young women accuse an ex-friend of breaking their door down.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.234
programme.desc: A man's family visit turns sour as he and the child's mother argue over a hairbrush. High school friends living together feud over rent, bills, and a trip.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.162
programme.desc: Teen sues ex-friend for burns and stolen laptop, countersued for harassment. Adult entertainment sued for refund after male dancers disrupt birthday party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.47
programme.desc: A woman’s finger is broken after an argument at a party over alleged cocaine use; she claims she was pushed down the stairs by her roommate/Arrested as a result of bouncing two checks, a man sues a former friend who gave them to him.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay makes a decision that changes the competition; two chefs work as servers during the dinner service; each team nominates two contestants to be put up for elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Martin Yan judges six Chinese dishes created by the remaining contestants; during dinner service, one team disappoints a VIP guest; a contestant is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants enter an animal pen to determine which type of protein they will cook in the team challenge; during dinner service, the contestants must impress chef Ramsay's family.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must create five steak dishes; a diner finds an unpleasant surprise in her dish during dinner service; the elimination round brings out bad tempers.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of wannabe chefs through a series of gruelling challenges as they battle for the ultimate prize of a head chef position at his Las Vegas restaurant. The two teams are challenged to throw a party fit for a princess.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete to participate in a photo shoot and host a dinner for members of the Army.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Contact
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Junior Partner
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: The confusion over Lou's new business relationship with Matt continues to mount. Matt and Froy find themselves in a nice neighborhood on a mission to repossess a security car from the world's most bumbling guards, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt hit the docks.

programme.title: Operation Repo: New Truck Day
programme.desc: The repo team's new truck finally arrives, and with it, a new chapter in the building feud between Team Lou and Team Matt.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Blow to the Head
programme.desc: When Froy is seriously injured on a routine repo, the building confrontation between Lou and Matt continues to escalate.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burning Up
programme.desc: Lou's new business relationship with Matt starts to unravel when a botched job puts a serious strain on the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Getting the Axe
programme.desc: Tensions between Lou and Matt continue to boil when Matt enlists his daughter's aid on another job.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.(n)

programme.title: Minotaur: Minotaur
programme.desc: When the villagers offer their brethren as a sacrifice to the Minotaur, Theo (Tom Hardy) sets off on a harrowing quest to the labyrinth to kill the evil bull-god.

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.

programme.title: Beyond the Law
programme.desc: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Follows the key people at an investment bank over a 24-hour period during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.

programme.title: Fist of Fury
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee Classic! Lee plays Chen Zhen, a student of Huo Yuanjia, who fights to defend the honor of the Chinese in the face of foreign aggression, and to bring to justice those responsible for his master's death.

programme.title: Cops and Robbers
programme.desc: A strung-out hostage negotiator plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a cornered bank robber who is hell-bent on getting out of the bank and humiliating the negotiator in the process.

programme.title: Crystal Skulls
programme.desc: It is 2020 and the apocalypse is inevitable. 12 of 13 Crystal skulls are united causing catastrophic events. Only the 13th Skull can theoretically restore order before the Earth is destroyed from within by their power.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter and burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past decides to go AWOL.

programme.title: Megan's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When Megan is taken away from the only life she’s ever known and moves to a small town in West Virginia, she struggles to fit in. She also gives up her one true passion, dancing. But the nativity at her local church might just turn her life around.

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: Laura, a single mom meets a fellow single dad Ben, who enlists her help in taking care of a cute corgi puppy he plans to give to his daughter at Christmas. Through all the chaos, Lauren gets the chance to finally experience the holiday spirit.

programme.title: My Nanny's Secret
programme.desc: Starring Haylie Duff. When a home invasion robbery leaves one member of the wealthy Tyrell family dead, the family's live-in nanny, Claudia, begins to suspect that her troubled brother may be the culprit.

programme.title: My Son Is Innocent
programme.desc: After a brutal nighttime rape, police investigators zero in on teenager Eric Sutter. When the victim identifies Eric as her attacker, the legal system closes in on the boy as friends, neighbors and the media turn against him.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: Having the winning lottery jackpot ticket is the best thing that could have happened to delivery man Bill Regan. Determined to find out what happened, a friend retraces Bill's delivery stops and discovers they lead to her own husband.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Legendary half-demon Hellboy encounters an ancient resurrected sorceress who's out to avenge a past betrayal. Caught in a clash between the supernatural and the human, Hellboy becomes hell-bent on stopping her without triggering the end of the world.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham uses a shape-shifting monster to destroy Robin Hood (Robin Dunne).(n)

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched.

programme.title: Mark & Russell's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Mark is excited when the most popular girl in his class asks HIM to drive her to a party, except he doesn't have a license. With his popularity on the line and his best friend Russell in tow, Mark hits the road on a cross-town adventure.

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Blue Iguana
programme.desc: Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse. Feat: Sam Rockwell.

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.(n)

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: The discovery of a dying man by two students at Russell Square tube station triggers a hunt for cannibals preying on passengers.

programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: A wealthy hunter invites a group of people to his fortified mansion hoping to trap the werewolf among them.

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: A glamour model helps Scotland Yard to catch a criminal gang.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Mind of Simon Foster
programme.desc: In an impoverished future, Simon Foster goes to a pawnshop to sell some personal items to raise money for rent. The shop owner offers to buy some of his memories. In Simon Foster's life, what could be possibly be valuable?

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Wall
programme.desc: A U.S. military experiment opens a portal to an unknown place. After sending through one team, the Army calls upon a career soldier to investigate, where he finds an idyllic planet. He has to decide whether to stay or go back to his old life.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Cat and Mouse
programme.desc: A shy woman finds that a cat is actually a cursed "Casanova." She falls for the man but finds that her Prince Charming is actually a scoundrel.

programme.title: Rendezvous in a Dark Place
programme.desc: An old woman with an obsession with death attends funerals for entertainment. One night when an injured thief breaks into her home, she lets him die and waits for Death to come and collect him.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Many, Many Monkeys
programme.desc: An epidemic breaks out and many people are struck blind. Something more happens, however: People have become cold and heartless toward each other.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: A man plotting to murder his wife's lover meets a blind singer who seems to know all about his plans.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Crazy as a Soup Sandwich
programme.desc: A man sells his soul to a demon for some racing tips. After being terrified by the demon he goes for help from the criminal boss he borrowed the track money from.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Special Service
programme.desc: A man finds that his life has been on TV for the past five years.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Wong's Lost and Found Emporium
programme.desc: David Wong searches for something he lost. He seeks the Lost and Found Emporium where he finds others looking for their lost items.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Irish Crown Affair
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Dublin, Ireland in search of the missing crown of the last King of Ireland.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fugue
programme.desc: FBI Agent Abby Corrigan's life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar abnormal during an investigation. Magnus and Will's heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Chimera
programme.desc: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Big Plot
programme.desc: Found among the wreckage of a crashed plane are parts of an atomic bomb and Peter uncovers a plot to start a Third World War.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Tourist Season
programme.desc: Challenger builds a windmill. But when his generator is struck by lightning, a portal is opened that ushers in a helicopter carrying a family of tourists from the year 2000.(n)
